mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_patent tp where 1 = 1

select tp.patent_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.ctgry_code , tp.nation_code , tp.patent_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn from tb_patent tp where 1 = 1
order by tp.regist_dt desc, tp.patent_sn desc
order by tp.patent_sn desc
select tp.patent_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.ctgry_code , tp.nation_code , tp.patent_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn from tb_patent tp where tp.patent_sn = #{patentSn}
